verses.text: And \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w either|strong="H0376"\w* of them his \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w therein|strong="H2004"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* thereon, and \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them not.

And there went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* them, and they \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Then \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, This \add is it\add* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in them that come \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* me, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* I will be \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*. And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* held his \w peace|strong="H1826"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w* and \w Elzaphan|strong="H0469"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w* the \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Come \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

So they went \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* them in their \w coats|strong="H3801"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*; as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* and unto \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Uncover|strong="H6544"\w* not your \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, neither \w rend|strong="H6533"\w* your \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*; lest ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and lest \w wrath|strong="H7107"\w* come upon all the \w people|strong="H5712"\w*: but let your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w bewail|strong="H1058"\w* the \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w kindled|strong="H8313"\w*.

And ye shall not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, lest ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: for the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* upon you. And they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Do not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* nor strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, thou, nor thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with thee, when ye \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, lest ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*:
And that ye may put \w difference|strong="H0914"\w* between \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* and \w unholy|strong="H2455"\w*, and between \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*;

And that ye may \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* all the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto them by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* and unto \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that were \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* that \w remaineth|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it without \w leaven|strong="H4682"\w* \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: for it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*:

And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, because it \add is\add* thy \w due|strong="H2706"\w*, and thy \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w due|strong="H2706"\w*, of the \w sacrifices|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*: for so I am \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And the \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* and \w heave|strong="H8641"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* in a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; thou, and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* with thee: for \add they be\add* thy \w due|strong="H2706"\w*, and thy \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w due|strong="H2706"\w*, \add which\add* are \w given|strong="H5414"\w* out of the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

The \w heave|strong="H8641"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* and the \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* shall they \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* with the offerings made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* of the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, to \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* \add it for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and it shall be thine, and thy \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* with thee, by a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w diligently|strong="H1875"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and, behold, it was \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w*: and he was \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* with \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \add which were\add* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \add alive\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Wherefore have ye not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, seeing it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, and \add God\add* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it you to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, to make \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of it was not \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* in \w within|strong="H6441"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place:\add* ye should \w indeed|strong="H0398"\w* have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* it in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, as I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Behold, this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* have they \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* their sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* and their burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and such things have \w befallen|strong="H7122"\w* me: and \add if\add* I had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, should it have been \w accepted|strong="H3190"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*?
And when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add that\add*, he was \w content|strong="H3190"\w*.
